name: Cozy Nook
description:
This game is a bartending talking-simulator in which you control Cath who tends a café and bakery in a small town where people with abilities (or magic) can take refuge and lead a normal life. Cath listens to her clients and can help them out.

This videogame is a student project which was developed in a month, between a game designer and two programmers (we did not have an artist unfortunately).

CREDITS:

Gameplay Programmers: Floren Corty (Bartending System) & Luis Montell(Narrative System)

Game designer: Aloma Benito

NOTE: To make FOAM you heat Milk twice
